 ![](BDP2-icon.png){width=275}
 
BigDataProcessor2 (BDP2) is a Fiji plugin for interactive processing of TB-sized image data.

BDP2 uses BigDataViewer for rendering and the ImgLib2 library for image processing.

The BDP2 is the new version of BigDataProcessor1.

Main features:

lazy-loading of TB sized image data
lazy-processing of TB sized image data
ImageJ macro scripting support
